name: Wendigo
description: A gaunt, antlered horror driven by insatiable hunger. The Wendigo grows stronger with each kill, consuming the essence of its victims.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Devours a corpse to heal and permanently gain stats.

abilities.name: Ravenous Frenzy
abilities.description: Enters a bloodthirsty state, gaining attack speed but losing armor.

abilities.name: Freezing Aura
abilities.description: Nearby enemies are slowed by supernatural cold.

abilities.name: Hunger Grows
abilities.description: Gains bonus damage and health for each kill.
